column4: so ohirs 1st command wouldn't have done anything and his 2nd works. so whats your point?
tar -xzvf data.tar.gz to get contents of data.tar.gz
or just "ar p file.deb data.tar.gz | tar zx"
hosts.deny/allow control incoming connections, not outbound
are you sure? hosts files used to not be stateful
meaning before, your computer would still send a packet to initiate a connection, but when it came back from that host it would be dropped, and no connection would be established
